Refer QA/QC procedures to be applied Cross check measurement results with records for sold electricity The electricity export and import has been cross checked from the monthly reconciliations for invoicing /16/ and found consistent. Purpose of the data Calculation of baseline emissions The purpose of the monitoring parameter is to calculate the baseline emission which is in accordance with the registered VCS-PD /05/.
